meanings.definition: Thoughtful and polite behavior towards others.
meanings.sent1: She showed great considerateness by holding the door open for the elderly lady.
meanings.sent2: It is important to always display considerateness towards your classmates.
meanings.sent3: His considerateness in sharing his toys made all the children happy.
meanings.sent4: The considerateness of the driver in letting the pedestrians cross was commendable.
meanings.sent5: The considerateness of the host in preparing vegetarian options was appreciated by all.

meanings.definition: The quality of being kind and understanding towards others.
meanings.sent1: Her considerateness towards her friends always brightened their day.
meanings.sent2: We should all strive to show considerateness in our interactions with others.
meanings.sent3: The considerateness of the cat in sharing its food with the dog was heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: The considerateness of the teacher in listening to each student's opinion was remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The considerateness of the team members towards each other created a positive work environment.
